staticMethods.name: Connect
staticMethods.description: Returns an instance of a display at a specific position

staticMethods.name: New
staticMethods.description: Returns an instance of a pixel buffer

staticMethods.name: Sin
staticMethods.description: Returns the sine of a number in radians

staticMethods.name: Cos
staticMethods.description: Returns the cosine of a number in radians

staticMethods.name: Tan
staticMethods.description: Returns the tangent of a number in radians

staticMethods.name: Floor
staticMethods.description: Rounds the number downwards to the nearest integer

staticMethods.name: Sleep
staticMethods.description: Pauses the thread for a number of minecraft ticks
